The following SOAP API operations need to be converted to RESTful APIs. They will be added to the ICRESTAPI code repository.
Cloud Invoicing
https://www.invoicecloud.com/portal/webservices/CloudInvoicing.asmx
UploadInvoice ( 
https://www.invoicecloud.com/portal/webservices/CloudInvoicing.asmx?op=UploadInvoice
  )
UploadInvoiceFile ( 
https://www.invoicecloud.com/portal/webservices/CloudInvoicing.asmx?op=UploadInvoiceFile
  )
Deploy Target
: 2/6/2025
UploadInvoice ( RESTful )
The new API will create a invoice
api/v1/cloudinvoicing/uploadinvoice
Example Request Body
json
{
    "CustomerRecord": "58~CR|59~ACTB2B153410745|60~James Martinez|409~1",
    "InvoiceHeaderRecord": "7~IH|8~N|9~B3D8E0C6-0A66-4566-BD1F-480C87121EA6|10~INV42-12032024150745431009|11~12/3/2024|12~12/18/2024|13~12936.01|93~5985.71|252~42|375~1",
    "InvoiceDetailRecords": "70~ID|72~InvoiceDetail"
}
Example Response Body
json
{
    "Success": true,
    "Message": "Invoice Imported",
    "InvoiceGUID": "B3D8E0C6-0A66-4566-BD1F-480C87121EA6"
}
UploadInvoiceFile ( RESTful )
The new API will receive a BIF file via the base 64 encoded 
FileContents
 property
api/v1/cloudinvoicing/uploadinvoicefile
Example Request Body
json
{
    "FileContents": ""
}
Example Response Body

PaymentReportingDataSetByDateRangeFromGMT2  ( RESTful )
The new API will return payment report data in JSON format.  The endpoint will support query string parameters to query report data.
/api/v1/biller/reporting/payment?startdate={startdate}&enddate={enddate}&locationreference={locationreference?}
Parameters:
startdate (DateTime)
: Start date in GMT
enddate (DateTime)
: End date in GMT
locationreference (String)
 : Location
Example Request
/api/v1/biller/reporting/payment?startdate=1%2F1%2F2025&enddate=1%2F23%2F2025
Example Response Body
json
{
        "Status": "Success",
        "Data": [
            {
                "InvoiceNumber": "1234-5678",
                "InvoiceGUID": "1a2b3c-1234-12aa-34bbe-123a456b789d",
